A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolute dumpster fire.  Poor editing with botched action scenes.  Ham fisted political messages shoved down your throat\, such as cruelty to animals\, toxic feminism\, and war profiteering.  Every lesson the characters learn\, are immediately dropped in the 3rd act.  Cringe jokes like \"Please put a shirt on.\"  Characters we've known all of our lives betraying us and themselves to satisfy a terrible director's ego\, so he can claim \"Look I killed Star Wars!\"  Leia flying like Mary Poppins is unforgivable.  Luke dying from meditating is unforgivable.  Fuck this movie\, and fuck Rian Johnson! .5 stars
